# polar_product (Data Source)

Fetches a Polar product by ID.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polar_product" "example" {
  id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
}

output "product_name" {
  value = data.polar_product.example.name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The product ID.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the product.
- `is_archived` (Boolean) Whether the product is archived.
- `medias` (List of String) List of media file IDs attached to the product.
- `metadata` (Map of String) Key-value metadata.
- `name` (String) The name of the product.
- `prices` (Attributes List) List of prices for this product. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--prices))
- `recurring_interval` (String) The billing interval for recurring products.

<a id="nestedatt--prices"></a>
### Nested Schema for `prices`

Read-Only:

- `amount_type` (String) The price type.
- `cap_amount` (Number) Maximum charge in cents (metered_unit type).
- `maximum_amount` (Number) The maximum amount in cents (custom type).
- `meter_id` (String) The meter ID (metered_unit type).
- `minimum_amount` (Number) The minimum amount in cents (custom type).
- `preset_amount` (Number) The initial amount in cents (custom type).
- `price_amount` (Number) The price amount in cents.
- `price_currency` (String) The currency code.
- `seat_tiers` (Attributes List) Pricing tiers (seat_based type). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--prices--seat_tiers))
- `unit_amount` (String) The price per unit in cents (metered_unit type).

<a id="nestedatt--prices--seat_tiers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `prices.seat_tiers`

Read-Only:

- `max_seats` (Number) Maximum number of seats for this tier.
- `min_seats` (Number) Minimum number of seats for this tier.
- `price_per_seat` (Number) Price per seat in cents.
